Tag.name: expanded
Tag.description: True if the node level is to be expanded when the object is initialized.

Tag.name: index
Tag.description: Index of the tree node inside the TreeView.

Tag.name: onClickEval
Tag.description: Evaluate (load and interpret) the resources available at given URL when the button is clicked

Tag.name: onClickExecute
Tag.description: Execute the JavaScript expression passed as value of this property when the button is clicked

Tag.name: onClickPublish
Tag.description: Publish an event / Link event when the button is pushed

Tag.name: table
Tag.description: The table used on the particular level of the TreeView (must be in some parent-child relationship with preceding level).

Tag.name: title
Tag.description: Column that will serve the data visible in the TreeView node.

Stereotype.name: DataGridColumn
Stereotype.notes: Abstract representation of DataGrid columns collection.

Tag.name: grouping
Tag.description: If true, succesive identical values in this column will be grouped

Tag.name: label
Tag.description: The name to be displayed in this column's header.

Tag.name: minSize
Tag.description: The column has at least this many characters (visually)

Tag.name: name
Tag.description: The name of the column in the DataObject

Tag.name: size
Tag.description: The column has, when created, this many characters. The default gives the column all the remaining space to fill up the parent container.

Tag.name: skipEscape
Tag.description: If true, treat the contents of this column coming from the DataObject as HTML code (warning! make sure you escape the contents. no spaces allowed, don't exceed the row height, etc.).

Tag.name: image
Tag.description: The url to image for this item

Tag.name: label
Tag.description: The text to *show* for this item in the autocomplete list. The actual identity of the item is in the value field.

Tag.name: selectable
Tag.description: True if the item can be selected

Tag.name: value
Tag.description: The text for this item. This is filled in the Field if the item is selected. Basically, this is the only property required for an AutoCompleteListItem

Tag.name: canHide
Tag.description: True if the docking panel can be hidden.

Tag.name: index
Tag.description: The index of the docking panel inside the Splitter.

Tag.name: maxSize
Tag.description: Maximum size of the docking panel.

Tag.name: minSize
Tag.description: Minimum size of the docking panel.

Tag.name: size
Tag.description: Size of the docking panel.

Tag.name: title
Tag.description: Title of the docking panel.

Stereotype.name: ToolButton
Stereotype.notes: A tool button is a special button that provides quick-access to specific commands or options. As opposed to a normal command button, a tool button usually doesn't show a text label, but shows an icon instead and it is usually placed inside a Toolbar or ToolGroup.

Tag.name: actionCommand
Tag.description: When the button is clicked an Action.ActionPerformed link event is generated with the action command as parameter.

Tag.name: align
Tag.description: The horizontal alignment of the component in the layout cell. Possible values are: 'left', 'right', 'middle'

Tag.name: class
Tag.description: An additional CSS class name to be appended to the DOM object class name in order to customize its appearance.

Tag.name: disable
Tag.description: Flag set to true if the object is disabled

Tag.name: disabledImage
Tag.description: The image to be displayed on the tool button when the button is disabled

Tag.name: disableOnInit
Tag.description: If set to true the object will be disabled during the processing of visual object properties, processing which happens in the private method _processVisualObjectProperties usually after the DOM Nodes of the component have been created

Tag.name: forceLabel
Tag.description: Setting this property to TRUE will display it's text label regardless of what setting has the toolbar related to text labels.

Tag.name: height
Tag.description: The desired height of the window (pixels)

Tag.name: hide
Tag.description: If set to true will prevent the object from making its gui visible

Tag.name: hideOnInit
Tag.description: If set to true will hide the object during initialization, it can still be made visible afterward.

Tag.name: hotkey
Tag.description: If set, a hotkey is automatically assigned to the object at initialization

Tag.name: hoverImage
Tag.description: The image to be displayed when the mouse cursor is over the button

Tag.name: id
Tag.description: Object name/identifier (must be unique in DOM)

Tag.name: image
Tag.description: The image to be displayed on the tool button

Tag.name: label
Tag.description: The label to be displayed on the button

Stereotype.name: ToolGroup
Stereotype.notes: A simple container for grouping multiple related tool buttons together.

Tag.name: align
Tag.description: The horizontal alignment of the component in the layout cell. Possible values are: 'left', 'right', 'middle'

Tag.name: backgroundColor
Tag.description: Specifies the color of the containers background. Its value can be a string containing the hex code of the color ('#FFFFFF') or the name of the color ('red') or a Java Script expression that evaluates to a color, like: Quarix.Theme.PanelBackground in which case it does not need to be quoted;

Tag.name: border
Tag.description: The name of the border this container will display.

Tag.name: borderColor
Tag.description: In case there is a SOLID border requested the color of the solid border will be specified with this property, otherwise it will not be used by other border types. Its value can be a string containing the hex code of the color ('#FFFFFF') or the name of the color ('red') or a Java Script expression that evaluates to a color, like: Quarix.Theme.BorderColor in which case it does not need to be quoted

Tag.name: borderWidth
Tag.description: Only applies to SOLID border and specifies the widthof the border line.

Stereotype.name: Accordion
Stereotype.notes: The Accordion is an interface element similar to a vertical set of tabs - when you click on the header of an accordion panel, the header animates either up or down to reveal its associated container. Being rendered vertically there is space to accommodate more markup than simply the name of the tab. Thus an accordion tab can have a lot more information than a normal tab usually does.

Tag.name: align
Tag.description: The horizontal alignment of the component in the layout cell. Possible values are: 'left', 'right', 'middle'

Tag.name: direction
Tag.description: The direction of the split. "v" (vertical) means the headers and page displayed are horizontal blocks (one on top of each other, each 100% width), as opposed to "h" (horizontal) which makes them vertical blocks (each 100% height), which places them side-by-side.

Stereotype.name: FilterView
Stereotype.notes: Non GUI component able to handle the filtering process for a report or an data object.

Tag.name: applyOnInit
Tag.description: Apply the filter on initialize initalizeObject

Tag.name: enctype
Tag.description: Determines how the form data is encoded. The default value (i.e. if you don't use this attribute at all) is "application/x-www-form-urlencoded", which is sufficient for almost any kind of form data. The one exception is if you want to do file uploads. In that case you should use "multipart/form-data".

Tag.name: exitOnSuccess
Tag.description: In case of an report filter if the filter is successfully aplied the filter view will ask for confirmExit in case exitOnSuccess is set to true.

Tag.name: fields
Tag.description: List of fields contained inside the form, comma separated field names

Tag.name: method
Tag.description: In case of an report filter the HTTP method through which the parameters will be sent (possible values are : 'post', 'get')

Tag.name: msg_filterview_confirm_apply
Tag.description: Localized message for cancel apply filter message
Tag.default: 'Current values have not been applied. Apply values before exit?'

Tag.name: target
Tag.description: In case of an report filter the target browser window in which the report will be loaded.

Tag.name: trapOK
Tag.description: In case this value is true the filterview will trap the confirmOK event. Usually useful when the filter view is included in the data window and an OK event is desired to be applied on the filter and not on any data view or form view available in the window.

Tag.name: url
Tag.description: In case of an report filter the URL of the report to which the filter parameters will be sent.

Stereotype.name: DataGrid
Stereotype.notes: The DataGrid control provides a simple yet powerful API to display tabular data on a web page. Notable features include sortable columns, pagination, scrolling, row selection and resizeable columns. A browse component is also able to display the data from a DataObject and insure navigation through the records of the DataObject.

Tag.name: altDO
Tag.description: Alternative data object. Especially useful for lookup fields that must work both in view and add/update mode. Because during an add/update operation the master data object is locked yet still the values have to change as a result of user modifying the data. Durring navigation data values comes as dataAvailable event, data that is processed and displayed. However during user modification values have to come as Action.valueChanged events and in that case an alternate data object is looked up and used for value lookups.

Tag.name: altDOColumns
Tag.description: In case and altDO is given and an Action.valueChanged event is received the line mask values of the lookup field will be filled with their equivalent altDO column values as specified by the altDOColumns (comma separated).

Stereotype.name: InputField
Stereotype.notes: Input fields are used for entering and displaying data in form and data views. The data can be of various types, such as : char, logical, integer, decimal or text. Input fields can have different behaviors such as read-only, or required and representations, as: such as Passwordfield, Textfield, Radiofield, Toglebox, Textarea, Combofield, Hiddenfield.

Tag.name: align
Tag.description: The horizontal alignment of the component in the layout cell. Possible values are: 'left', 'right', 'middle'

Tag.name: class
Tag.description: An additional CSS class name to be appended to the DOM object class name in order to customize its appearance.

Tag.name: dateFormat
Tag.description: In case the field has another format indicator like the dateFormat this can be passed in through this property. Usually it is used at field masks for date fields especially where format can be '99-99-9999' and dateFormat 'dmy' or 'mdy'

Tag.name: disable
Tag.description: Flag set to true if the object is disabled

Tag.name: fkDOColumnName
Tag.description: In case there is an fk window associated with this field and the user inputs the value manually, the field can try to select in the fk window the corespondent row with the associated fkDOColumnName and value

Tag.name: fkToolButtonLabel
Tag.description: In case there is an fk window associated with this field, the tool button that triggers that window can have a custom label set with this property

Tag.name: fkToolButtonTooltip

Tag.description: The column name in the associated data object if field is data bind.

Tag.name: fkWindowURL
Tag.description: In case the fk window can not be found in the register and eval URL to be called that should produce a window with the fkWindowName object name

Tag.name: format
Tag.description: The date format of the field. In case the field is a date, integer, decimal field this will be used as the base for the input mask of the field
